sentences.en: Any product made from cow's milk made him vomit.
sentences.cn: 任何乳制品都会让他呕吐。

sentences.en: He had swallowed so much sea water he wanted to vomit.
sentences.cn: 他呛了这么多海水，所以想吐。

sentences.en: He was afraid that it might nauseate him and he would vomit and lose his strength.
sentences.cn: 他怕这肉会使他恶心,弄得他呕吐,丧失力气.

sentences.en: I knew I was really in trouble when I began vomiting blood.
sentences.cn: 我开始吐血的时候才知道我的麻烦大了。

sentences.en: I was up all night cleaning vomit off an antique quilt.
sentences.cn: 我一整晚没睡都在清理古董被子上的呕吐物.

sentences.en: She began to vomit blood a few days before she died.
sentences.cn: 她临死前几天开始吐血。

sentences.en: She was stricken by pain and began to vomit.
sentences.cn: 她感到一阵疼痛,开始呕吐起来.

sentences.en: Tall chimneys belch [ vomit ] forth black smoke.
sentences.cn: 高高的烟囱 喷吐 出黑烟.

sentences.en: The rank smell of vomit reached me.
sentences.cn: 我闻到了呕吐物的臭气.

sentences.en: The smell made her want to vomit.
The stink of vomit reached me instantly.
sentences.cn: 我马上就闻到了呕吐物的酸臭味.

sentences.en: The taste of blood in her throat made her want to vomit.
sentences.cn: 她嗓子里的血腥味让她直恶心。

sentences.en: The unpleasant smell made her sick and she began to vomit.
sentences.cn: 那难闻的味道令她不适,她开始呕吐起来.

sentences.en: They gave her salty water to make her vomit.
sentences.cn: 他们给她喝盐水好让她吐出来.

sentences.en: Too much beer makes me vomit.
sentences.cn: 喝太多啤酒会使我呕吐.

sentences.en: Trains vomit out crowds of passengers at a terminus.
sentences.cn: 成群的旅客在终点站从列车中挤出来.

sentences.en: Zimmer slipped and nearly fell on a pool of vomit.
sentences.cn: 齐默滑了一跤，差点儿摔倒在一滩呕吐物上。

trans.tran_en: food or other substances that come up from your stomach and through your mouth when you vomit

trans.tran_cn: 呕吐， 恶心； 喷出
trans.tran_en: to bring food or drink up from your stomach out through your mouth, because you are ill
